commits: 0613211: feat(memo-card): add copy to clipboard functionality
summary: Issue #321 memo copy functionality implemented via TDD. Added copy-to-clipboard button to MemoCard header (left of delete button) with Copy/Check icon toggle, 2-second timer feedback, useRef+useEffect cleanup for unmount safety, empty/whitespace content guard, and rapid double-click handling. 8 new test cases added (total 25 pass). TypeScript and ESLint checks pass with 0 errors.
